targets.query: SELECT mean("rate_payloads_consumed") FROM "dunedaq.readoutlibs.readoutinfo.ReadoutInfo" WHERE (partition_id = '${partition}' AND "source_id" =~ /.*\.datahandler_\d+/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "source_id"

SELECT mean("num_buffer_elements") FROM "dunedaq.readoutlibs.readoutinfo.ReadoutInfo" WHERE ("partition_id"='${partition}' AND "source_id" =~ /.*\.datahandler_\d+/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "source_id" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_requests")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.readoutlibs.readoutinfo.ReadoutInfo" WHERE ("partition_id"='${partition}' AND "source_id" =~ /.*\.datahandler_\d+/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_requests_found")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.readoutlibs.readoutinfo.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE ("partition_id"='${partition}' AND "source_id" =~ /.*\.datahandler_\d+/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_requests_delayed")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.readoutlibs.readoutinfo.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE ("partition_id"='${partition}' AND "source_id" =~ /.*\.datahandler_\d+/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_requests_bad")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.readoutlibs.readoutinfo.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE ("partition_id"='${partition}' AND "source_id" =~ /.*\.datahandler_\d+/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_requests_old_window")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.readoutlibs.readoutinfo.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE ("partition_id"='${partition}' AND "source_id" =~ /.*\.datahandler_\d+/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_requests_timed_out")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.readoutlibs.readoutinfo.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE ("partition_id"='${partition}' AND "source_id" =~ /.*\.datahandler_\d+/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_requests_uncategorized")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.readoutlibs.readoutinfo.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE ("partition_id"='${partition}' AND "source_id" =~ /.*\.datahandler_\d+/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT sum("tot_request_response_time")/sum("num_requests_handled") FROM "dunedaq.readoutlibs.readoutinfo.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE "partition_id"='${partition}' AND $timeFilter AND "num_requests_handled">0 GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT sum("tot_request_response_time")/sum("num_requests_handled") FROM "dunedaq.readoutlibs.readoutinfo.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE "partition_id"='${partition}' AND "num_requests_handled">0 AND  $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "source_id" fill(null)

SELECT min("min_request_response_time") FROM "dunedaq.readoutlibs.readoutinfo.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE "partition_id"='${partition}' AND $timeFilter AND "num_requests_handled">0 GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT max("max_request_response_time") FROM "dunedaq.readoutlibs.readoutinfo.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE "partition_id"='${partition}' AND $timeFilter AND "num_requests_handled">0 GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_buffer_cleanups")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.readoutlibs.readoutinfo.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE ("partition_id"='${partition}' AND "source_id" =~ /.*\.datahandler_\d+/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_payloads_overwritten")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.readoutlibs.readoutinfo.ReadoutInfo" WHERE ("partition_id"='${partition}' AND "source_id" =~ /.*\.datahandler_\d+/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT sum("num_requests_waiting") FROM "dunedaq.readoutlibs.readoutinfo.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE ("partition_id"='${partition}' AND "source_id" =~ /.*\.datahandler_\d+/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "source_id"

SELECT spread("last_daq_timestamp") FROM "dunedaq.readoutlibs.readoutinfo.ReadoutInfo" WHERE (partition_id = '${partition}' AND "source_id" =~ /.*\.${timestamp_app}\..*/) AND  $timeFilter AND "last_daq_timestamp" > 0  GROUP BY time(500ms) fill(null)

SELECT mean("last_daq_timestamp") FROM "dunedaq.readoutlibs.readoutinfo.ReadoutInfo" WHERE (partition_id = '${partition}' AND "source_id" =~ /.*\.datahandler_\d+/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "source_id"

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_tps_sent")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.readoutlibs.readoutinfo.RawDataProcessorInfo" WHERE ("partition_id"='${partition}' AND "source_id" = '${partition}.${readout_app}.${readout_module}') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_tpsets_sent")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.readoutlibs.readoutinfo.RawDataProcessorInfo" WHERE ("partition_id"='${partition}' AND "source_id" = '${partition}.${readout_app}.${readout_module}') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_tps_dropped")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.readoutlibs.readoutinfo.RawDataProcessorInfo" WHERE ("source_id" = '${partition}.${readout_app}.${readout_module}') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT sum("rate_tp_hits") FROM "dunedaq.readoutlibs.readoutinfo.RawDataProcessorInfo" WHERE  ("source_id" = '${partition}.${readout_app}.${readout_module}') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_buffer_cleanups")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.readoutlibs.readoutinfo.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE ("source_id" = '${partition}.${readout_app}.${readout_module}') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_payloads_overwritten")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.readoutlibs.readoutinfo.ReadoutInfo" WHERE  ("source_id" = '${partition}.${readout_app}.${readout_module}')  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_requests")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.readoutlibs.readoutinfo.ReadoutInfo" WHERE ("source_id" = '${partition}.${readout_app}.${readout_module}') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_requests_found")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.readoutlibs.readoutinfo.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE ("source_id" = '${partition}.${readout_app}.${readout_module}') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_requests_delayed")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.readoutlibs.readoutinfo.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE ("source_id" = '${partition}.${readout_app}.${readout_module}') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_requests_bad")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.readoutlibs.readoutinfo.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE ("source_id" = '${partition}.${readout_app}.${readout_module}') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_requests_old_window")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.readoutlibs.readoutinfo.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE ("source_id" = '${partition}.${readout_app}.${readout_module}') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_requests_timed_out")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.readoutlibs.readoutinfo.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE ("source_id" = '${partition}.${readout_app}.${readout_module}') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_requests_uncategorized")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.readoutlibs.readoutinfo.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE ("source_id" = '${partition}.${readout_app}.${readout_module}') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY="partition_id" where $timeFilter
list.label: Partition name
list.name: partition
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY="partition_id" where $timeFilter

list.definition: SELECT "source_id" FROM (SELECT "last_daq_timestamp","source_id" FROM "dunedaq.readoutlibs.readoutinfo.ReadoutInfo" WHERE $timeFilter AND "partition_id"='${partition}' AND "last_daq_timestamp" > 0)
list.label: Timestamp spread apps
list.name: timestamp_app
list.query: SELECT "source_id" FROM (SELECT "last_daq_timestamp","source_id" FROM "dunedaq.readoutlibs.readoutinfo.ReadoutInfo" WHERE $timeFilter AND "partition_id"='${partition}' AND "last_daq_timestamp" > 0)
